snippet: The anger and confusion over Sergeant Bergdahl’s release seems like a fitting end to a messy and inconclusive war.
abstract: Op-Ed article by author Alex Berenson contends that furor over release of Afghanistan prisoner of war Sgt Bowe Bergdahl stems from troubling circumstances of his capture and fact that several American soldiers were killed in months following his disappearance; maintains anger and confusion seems a fitting, messy and inconclusive end to war that went on far too long without a clear purpose.
lead_paragraph: The anger and confusion over Sergeant Bergdahl’s release seems like a fitting end to a messy and inconclusive war.
